sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"紧急的，严重的"之意。
means: critical ： 指极为危急或缺乏的状况，而这种状况标志一种转折点。
acute ： 通常指需要和缺乏的紧急程度。也指病情的严重。
urgent ： 指情况紧急，急需解决问题。

sentence.Network_en: Officials at the State Department say the issue is urgent.
sentence.Network_cn: 国务院官员说该问题很急迫。

sentence.Network_en: His mother leaned forward and spoke to him in urgent undertones.
sentence.Network_cn: 他母亲身子前倾，小声而急切地跟他说话。

sentence.Network_en: The memo ends: "Please give this matter your most urgent attention."
sentence.Network_cn: 备忘录的结尾写道：“请将此事作为亟待处理事项。”

list.abs: 张雪娇的空间 ... Have a good time. 玩的很高兴。 It's urgent. 有急事。 It doesn't make any difference. 没关系。.
2.尿急(urgent micturition)有尿意迫不及待要排而难以自控。常见病因有膀胱尿道炎等。
常见商务英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... usance letter of credit 远期信用证 urgent telegram 急电 validity 有效期限.
电器电子词汇英语翻译(U-Z) ... urgent call 加急电活 urgent telegram 紧急电报 usable sensitivity 可用灵敏度.
call out的翻译中文意思... ... unscheduled call 意外停靠[停泊] urgent call 加急电话, 紧急呼叫 virtual call 虚拟调用[呼叫].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French, from Latin urgent- 'pressing, driving', from the verb urgere (see urge)

entry.def: If something is urgent, it needs to be dealt with as soon as possible.

example.ex: There is an urgent need for food and water...
He had urgent business in New York.

entry.def: If you speak in an urgent way, you show that you are anxious for people to notice something or to do something.

example.ex: His voice was low and urgent...
His mother leaned forward and spoke to him in urgent undertones.
example.tran: 他母亲身子前倾，小声而急切地跟他说话。

sentences.sentence: "too pressing to permit of longer delay"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,通常表示"……人",也可以表示其他具体物.; 3. 表名词,"……药剂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: excel优胜,超越+ent……的→excellent卓越的,极好的
insist坚持+ent……的→adj.坚持的;逼人注意的
sent感觉+i+ent……的→adj.有知觉的,知悉的
sil+ent……的→adj.寂静的,沉默的,无声的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+i+ent……的→adj.短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的
deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
correspond通信+ent……人→n.记者,通讯员;通信者
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [大中学校的]学生;研究者,学者

stems_affixes.word_buile: deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
re再+ag做+ent……药剂→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂

Sentence.sentence: It is in urgent need of further development.
There is an urgent need for them to be reconstructed.
million jobs lost in the last three months, there is urgent desire to boost the economy as quickly as possible.

Still, there's a huge disconnect between the way we currently train scientists and the actual employment opportunities available for them, and an urgent need for dramatic improvements in training programs to help close the gap
They meet the urgent needs of the corporate world.

sentences.cn: 我们有一件紧要的事情。

sentences.en: He says the matter is urgent.
It is most urgent that the patient should get to hospital.
sentences.cn: 那病人应该马上送医院。

sentences.en: She was urgent for the doctor to come.

jushi.chinese: 我们有一件紧要的事情。

jushi.english: He says the matter is urgent.
She was urgent for the doctor to come.
